about.title: Shri Sai Cattle Feeds
about.para1: Established in 2023, Shri Sai Cattle Feeds was founded with a clear mission — to provide farmers with high-quality, natural, and nutrient-rich cattle feeds that improve animal strength and productivity.
about.para2: Healthy cows are the backbone of successful dairy farmers. That is why our feeds use carefully selected ingredients like maize, grains, oil cakes, minerals, and salts to boost milk production, growth, and digestion.
about.para3: Our commitment to purity, consistency, and farmer satisfaction has made us a trusted brand among dairy farmers.

products_section.heading: Our Premium Product
products_section.description: At Shri Sai Cattle Feed, we bring together time-tested grains and natural proteins to create a balanced, powerful feed mix. Each ingredient plays a vital role in improving milk yield, digestion, and overall cattle health — because healthy cattle make happy farmers.

benefits_section.heading: Benefits For Your Cattle
benefits_section.benefit1_desc: Crafted with wholesome, natural ingredients sourced from trusted farms for pure nutrition.
benefits_section.benefit2_desc: Special formulation enhances milk yield and fat percentage.
benefits_section.benefit3_desc: Added vitamins and minerals strengthen immunity.
benefits_section.benefit4_desc: Helps in healthy weight gain and muscle development.
benefits_section.benefit5_desc: Balanced nutrition improves breeding efficiency and calf health.

whyworks_section.heading: Why Our Feed Works Best
whyworks_section.description: Every batch of Shri Sai Cattle Feeds is designed with a balanced mix of proteins, energy, minerals, and fiber. This helps in:

missionvision_section.heading: Mission & Vision
missionvision_section.mission_desc: To provide natural, nutrient-rich cattle feeds that increase milk production, improve cattle health, and boost farmer income — delivering trust and quality in every bag.
missionvision_section.vision_desc: To become one of India’s most trusted and farmer-friendly cattle feed brands with innovation, ethics, and commitment to rural growth.

faq_section.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq_section.q1_title: What is cattle feed made of?
faq_section.q1_desc: Our feed is a balanced mix of maize, rice bran, groundnut cake, soybean, and essential minerals to support healthy growth and milk production.
faq_section.q2_title: Is your feed safe for all types of cattle?
faq_section.q2_desc: Yes, it is suitable for cows, buffaloes, and calves. We do not use any harmful chemicals.
faq_section.q3_title: How does your feed increase milk production?
faq_section.q3_desc: High protein and balanced nutrients support digestion and energy conversion, resulting in increased milk yield and quality.
faq_section.q4_title: Do you use chemicals or preservatives?
faq_section.q4_desc: No. Our feed is made using 100% natural ingredients without harmful additives.
faq_section.q5_title: How should cattle feed be stored?
faq_section.q5_desc: Store in a cool and dry place in airtight bags or containers.
faq_section.q6_title: How often should feed be given?
faq_section.q6_desc: Feed twice a day depending on age, weight, and purpose (milk/yield/growth).
faq_section.q7_desc: Yes, essential minerals like calcium, phosphorus, and vitamins are added.
faq_section.q8_title: Can calves eat the same feed?
faq_section.q8_desc: Calves require a separate feed formula. We also offer calf starter feed.
faq_section.q9_desc: If stored properly, it stays fresh for up to 3 months.
faq_section.q10_title: Do you supply to dairy farms?
faq_section.q10_desc: Yes, bulk orders and discounts are available for farms.
